Name: The Evil Party
About the game: The Evil Party is a very difficult platforming game, you play a ninja, and you have to go through many levels to get to the party . But it will be very difficult to do this, the game does not forgive mistakes, the player dies with one blow and starts the level first . The game has secret rooms, bosses, large and complex levels, good music and an adventure atmosphere .

Meta Description: Looking for information on The Evil Party? Check out the release date (Jan 8, 2018), developer insights from Irvin Vaush, and a complete game summary.
